news.title: Beatles episode of Hot Press Classics out now - feat. Paul Muldoon
news.summary: Roll up, roll up – Paul Nolan and Riccardo Dwyer are waiting to take you away, as they break down The Beatles' 1967 psychedelic classic, Magical Mystery Tour. Plus an interview with Pulitzer-winning poet Paul Muldoon.
